snippet.title: Borderlands: The Handsome Collection Accolades Trailer
snippet.description:
The reviews are in! Borderlands: The Handsome Collection is critically acclaimed and a must own collection for PS4 and Xbox One.
#JoinTheMayhem and don’t miss out on the fun that millions of players have already discovered. 
This is the essential Borderlands compilation and includes the definitive versions of both Borderlands 2 and Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel, built specifically for next-gen consoles. PlayStation 4 and Xbox One customers will experience the absolute highest performance and highest fidelity graphics for any Borderlands game ever played on a video game console. 

For the first time in the franchise’s history, play four-player split screen on a single television, all in stunning high definition. Experience the entire Handsome Jack saga (including all available bonus add-on content), from his not-so-humble beginnings to the heights of his egomaniacal tyranny. Continue the adventure by transferring your previous saves to the next generation of consoles with the new cross-save functionality (must be within same console family).

Official Site: http://2kgam.es/borderlandsthegame 
Find us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/borderlandsgame
Follow us on Twitter: http://2kgam.es/borderlandstwitter 
Follow us on Tumblr: http://2kgam.es/borderlandstumblr
Follow us on Instagram: http://2kgam.es/borderlandsinstagram
